alert.note: Alert for Northeast Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 4:19AM PST until January 06 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN TODAY... .Moderate to heavy snow is impacting the Inland Northwest this morning. Snowfall rates around Wenatchee, Chelan, Omak, and into the East Slopes of the Cascades have been very heavy and on the order of 1 to 2 inches per hour. All Cascade Passes are closed at this time. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Total snow accumulations between 7 and 16 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Mountain Road, Anatone, Peola, and Cloverland Road. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
